history.proof: hauto use: cond_pos, R_dist_refl unfold: locally_2d, R_dist.

exceptions.tactic: intros T U F G H f Hle Hlim.
apply filter_le_trans with (G := filtermap f F).
exceptions.exn: The reference F was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hlim was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hle was not found in the current environment.

original: intros T U F G H f Hle Hlim. unfold filterlim in *. apply filter_le_trans with (G := filtermap f F). - apply Hlim. - unfold filtermap. intros P GP. apply Hle. auto.
